dcterms:creator: M. Campi
A. Lecchini
S. Savaresi
dcterms:description: A dataset used for the Virtual Reference Feedback Tuning (VRFT) approach, which offers time-saving solutions for the calibration of fixed-structure controllers for dynamic systems.
dcterms:title: Meta-dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Van Heusden
A. Karimi
D. Bonvin
dcterms:description: Data collected from similar systems to enhance model reference control design by leveraging insights from previously tuned controllers.
dcterms:title: Data from similar systems

dcterms:creator: R. Busetto
A. Lucchini
S. Formentin
S. M. Savaresi
dcterms:description: Closed-loop data collected from controllers designed for various systems, used to optimize the tuning of controllers under safety constraints.
dcterms:title: Closed-loop data from controllers

dcterms:creator: R. Busetto
V. Breschi
S. Formentin
dcterms:description: Input/output data collected from a new motor, used to calibrate controllers based on the performance of similar systems.
dcterms:title: Input/output data from the new motor

dcterms:creator: R. Busetto
A. Lucchini
S. Formentin
S. M. Savaresi
dcterms:description: Data collected from a set of meta-motors, used to inform the design of controllers for new motor instances.
dcterms:title: Data from meta-motors

dcterms:creator: R. Busetto
A. Lucchini
S. Formentin
S. M. Savaresi
dcterms:description: Closed-loop outputs from controllers in the meta-dataset, used to evaluate and enhance the performance of new controllers.
dcterms:title: Closed-loop outputs from controllers in the meta-dataset
